summary: **Beowulf** is an old English poem about a hero who helps a king fight a monster named Grendel. After winning, Beowulf becomes king and later defeats a dragon, but dies in the battle. The story is set in ancient Scandinavia and was written down between 975 and 1025 AD, though it was probably told orally for a long time. It's considered a very important piece of old English literature and has been translated into many languages. The only copy of the poem survived a fire in the 1700s and is now kept in the British Library.
title: Beowulf
